title: Rekindled
description: Angie Kilpatrick, a CEO in the pharmaceutical world, has achieved everything she set out to do, yet lives with regret for walking away from the only man sheâ€™s ever loved. A decade later, she has the chance to fix her mistake. Instead of a happy reunion, she finds an angry man and another who puts her in a problematic situation. Shots are fired and Angie is on a quest once again to locate for her lost love. What she discovers is the man she thought was gone from her life forever.
author: Cait Jarrod
